prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If candidates are provided, you MUST choose one of them (even if it slightly overshoots quantity) and justify the pick—never return null when at least one candidate exists.
        Only when no candidates are supplied may you set `selected_product_id` to null, and those notes must begin with `MISSING_SKU:` so the pipeline can flag the meal for removal.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FAMXHOT1530",
  "name": "Family Extra-Hot Chili Night (Caribbean & Mexican, 15–30, Simple)",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Caribbean",
      "Mexican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "ExtraHot"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "StoveTop",
      "OutdoorGrill"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "NoNutritionFocus"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Extra-Hot Habanero Jerk Chicken Tacos",
  "description": "Caribbean jerk-style chicken tossed with habanero heat, piled into Mexican tortillas with crisp lime cabbage and pineapple-coriander salsa. Built fast, fiery, and family-friendly for chili lovers.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat OutdoorGrill to high (or heat a large StoveTop skillet over medium-high).",
    "Thinly slice the cabbage.",
    "Dice the pineapple and red onion; chop the coriander.",
    "Cut 2 limes in half for juicing and 1 lime into wedges.",
    "Mince the garlic.",
    "Cut chicken thighs into bite-size strips.",
    "In a bowl, mix marinade: 2 tbsp olive oil, juice of 1 lime, garlic, allspice, 2 tbsp habanero sauce, 1 tsp salt, and black pepper."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Toss chicken with the marinade and let sit 5–10 minutes while you make sides.",
    "Make lime slaw: in a bowl, toss cabbage with juice of 1/2 lime, 1 tsp olive oil, and a pinch of salt. Set aside.",
    "Make pineapple salsa: combine pineapple, red onion, half the coriander, a pinch of salt, and juice of 1/2 lime.",
    "Grill or pan-cook chicken in a single layer until charred and cooked through, 6–8 minutes, turning once. Add more habanero sauce to taste for extra heat.",
    "Warm tortillas on the grill or in the dry skillet for 30–45 seconds per side.",
    "Assemble tacos: tortillas + chicken + lime slaw + pineapple salsa + remaining coriander. Serve with lime wedges and extra habanero sauce if desired."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken thighs",
      "quantity": "800 g",
      "preparation": "cut into bite-size strips"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "2 tbsp + 1 tsp",
      "preparation": "divided for marinade and slaw"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lime",
      "quantity": "3",
      "preparation": "2 juiced, 1 cut into wedges"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "3 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "allspice",
      "quantity": "1 tsp",
      "preparation": "ground"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "habanero sauce",
      "quantity": "2–3 tbsp",
      "preparation": "plus more to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "1 tsp",
      "preparation": "plus a pinch for slaw and salsa"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "1/2 tsp",
      "preparation": "freshly ground"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cabbage",
      "quantity": "1/2 small head",
      "preparation": "thinly sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pineapple",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "diced small"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "red onion",
      "quantity": "1/2 small",
      "preparation": "diced small"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "coriander",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "chopped, divided"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tortillas",
      "quantity": "12 small",
      "preparation": "warmed"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Caribbean",
      "Mexican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "ExtraHot"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "NoNutritionFocus"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "OutdoorGrill",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
